167 - 202 is a banger! 👍

This one is okay, it definitely stopped short of being great, sadly. A lot of them are too short, especially Sabaku and Kamita—amazing artists need more pages! Like half their stories’ were just story and exhibitionism, respectively. Not that having those things is off-putting but like, when it’s half of 20 odd pages, it definitely cuts into the real meat of the doujin. I’m not gonna pretend I love Shota/Loli, I don’t, but this month in particular really missed—Ookami Ou and whoever Pennel is had such boring stories. Ookami Ou is more annoying though since they got 30 pages of the most boring vanilla story, while people like Sabaku and Kamita barely got any action at all. Nogiwa Kaede is so weird with their Doujins, solid Rape/mind break content, but their last couple works all just break up the action with story in such weird ways, very jarring. I absolutely love Ronri, but this is not their best work, far too short, not enough sex. Overall 6/10 LO, I hope next months’ is better.
